All furnaces are currently idle with no ingredients

### Automated Iron Mining & Smelting at (-18.0, -53.0)

- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0) mining iron ore
- Stone furnace at (-17.0, -51.0) for direct smelting
Currently drill is working but blocked due to full output, furnace is working and contains iron plates

### Automated Copper Mining & Smelting at (-21.0, -73.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-21.0, -73.0) mining copper ore
- Stone furnace at (-20.0, -71.0) for direct smelting
Currently drill is working but blocked due to full output, furnace is working and producing copper plates

### Research Lab Setup at (10.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Lab loaded with automation science packs
Currently not functioning due to lack of power

### Incomplete Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Boiler at (-14.5, 19.0) with coal fuel
- Steam engine at (-8.5, 19.5)
System is not operational due to missing pipe connections between components

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Issues
- When placing a furnace or other entity, ensure you have the required item in inventory first
- Verify all required components are available before starting construction of complex systems

### Resource Management Issues
- Check inventory for required fuel (coal) before attempting to insert it into entities
- Monitor furnace and drill outputs to prevent blockages:
  - Drills are showing "waiting for space in destination" warnings
  - Need to regularly extract products from furnaces to maintain production flow

### Extraction Issues
- Verify target entity exists and contains the desired item before attempting extraction
- Ensure correct entity coordinates when attempting to extract items
- When extracting from furnaces, confirm they have completed smelting and contain the desired output

### Crafting Issues
- Ensure all required raw materials are available before attempting to craft items
- For items requiring machine assembly, build appropriate assembly machines first
- Check if item requires furnace smelting before attempting manual crafting

### Power System Setup Issues
- Ensure all components (pump, boiler, steam engine) are properly connected with pipes
- Have necessary pipes crafted before attempting to connect fluid-based systems
- Connect power poles to create electrical network for powered entities

### Resource Collection Workflow
- Maintain adequate coal supplies for fueling multiple entities
- Keep track of furnace contents to optimize extraction timing
- Gather necessary raw resources (like wood) before attempting to craft items requiring them
